Alteration 0

Grow Fortress

Various nations(4)

Ritual
N4
spell id [id]: 251
effect number [effect_number]: 63
damage [damage]: 10
spec [spec]: 8388608
number of effects [nreff]: 1
gems required [gemcost]: 35N
Remote Fort Construction:10 ?
Source Terrain : Sea, Forest
Cannot target geo mask : (Deep Sea)
 
(May Use Underwater [uwok])
This ritual forces nature to form a complete fortress in a matter of weeks, sturdy enough to rival stone walls. Defenders can stand on the walls and fire missiles from the parapets. This ritual can only be cast in forests or shallow seas, where nature has plenty of material to build from.
